instructions.name: appeal_slashing
docs: Appeal a slashing decision

instructions.name: calculate_buyer_allocations
docs: Calculate buyer allocations from multiple sellers in merit order

instructions.name: cancel_auction
docs: Cancel auction in case of failure or emergency

instructions.name: commit_supply
docs: Seller commits supply (one-time per (global_state, timeslot, seller))
Escrows seller's energy tokens into a program-owned vault (authority = timeslot PDA)

instructions.name: create_fill_receipt
docs: 2. Create Fill Receipt: Authority creates a receipt for each winning buyer.

instructions.name: emergency_pause
docs: Emergency pause the protocol

instructions.name: emergency_resume
docs: Resume protocol after emergency pause

instructions.name: emergency_withdraw
docs: Emergency withdrawal for stuck funds with comprehensive validation

instructions.name: execute_auction_clearing
docs: Execute the auction clearing algorithm to determine the final price and quantity
This is the core of the auction mechanism that finds the intersection of supply and demand

instructions.name: execute_proposal
docs: Execute approved governance proposal with multi-signature validation

instructions.name: execute_slashing
docs: Execute slashing penalties after appeal period with comprehensive validation

instructions.name: init_bid_registry
docs: Initialize bid registry for a timeslot

instructions.name: initialize
docs: Initialize the global protocol state

accounts.name: quote_mint
docs: Quote token mint (e.g., USDC)

instructions.name: open_timeslot
docs: Open a new auction timeslot

instructions.name: place_bid
docs: Buyer places bid, escrows quote tokens (USDC) into a program-owned vault (authority = timeslot PDA)

instructions.name: process_bid_batch
docs: Process a batch of bids for auction clearing
This instruction processes bids from multiple pages and aggregates them by price level

instructions.name: process_supply_batch
docs: Process a batch of supply commitments for auction clearing
This instruction processes supply from multiple sellers and sorts them by reserve price

instructions.name: propose_parameter_change
docs: Propose parameter change through governance with enhanced validation

accounts.name: proposer_stake
docs: Token account representing proposer's stake

instructions.name: redeem_energy_and_refund
docs: 4. Redeem Energy & Refund: Buyer claims their won energy and gets a refund for over-bids.

instructions.name: refund_cancelled_auction_buyers
docs: Refund buyers after auction cancellation

instructions.name: refund_cancelled_auction_sellers
docs: Refund sellers after auction cancellation

instructions.name: register_bid_page
docs: Register a bid page in the bid registry

instructions.name: register_seller
docs: Register seller in the seller registry for efficient lookup

instructions.name: report_non_delivery
docs: Report non-delivery by a seller

instructions.name: resolve_slashing_appeal
docs: Appeal resolution system with evidence validation

instructions.name: rollback_failed_auction
docs: Rollback failed auction to previous state

instructions.name: seal_timeslot
docs: Seal a timeslot (freeze order flow)

instructions.name: settle_timeslot
docs: 1. Settle Timeslot: Authority sets the final clearing price and sold quantity.
This instruction only records the outcome; it does not move funds.

instructions.name: validate_system_health
docs: Add comprehensive input validation and circuit breaker

instructions.name: verify_auction_clearing
docs: Verify the mathematical correctness of the auction clearing
This ensures that the auction results satisfy all required properties

instructions.name: verify_delivery_confirmation
docs: Verify delivery confirmation from oracle with automated penalty triggers

instructions.name: vote_on_proposal
docs: Vote on a governance proposal with multi-signature support

accounts.name: voter_stake
docs: Token account representing voter's stake

instructions.name: withdraw_proceeds
docs: 3. Withdraw Proceeds: Seller claims their earnings.
This instruction calculates the fee, sends it to the vault, and sends the net proceeds to the seller.

errors.name: DuplicateSupply
errors.msg: Supply already committed for this seller and timeslot

errors.name: InvalidTimeslot
errors.msg: Timeslot is not in the correct state for this operation

errors.name: InsufficientBalance
errors.msg: Insufficient token balance to commit supply

errors.name: AlreadyClaimed
errors.msg: Proceeds or refund have already been claimed

errors.name: ReservePriceNotMet
errors.msg: Seller's reserve price not met by clearing price

errors.name: AllocationExhausted
errors.msg: No more quantity available for allocation

errors.name: InvalidMeritOrder
errors.msg: Suppliers must be processed in merit order by reserve price

errors.name: NoMarketClearing
errors.msg: No market clearing possible - all reserve prices exceed highest bid

errors.name: NoIntersection
errors.msg: No intersection found between supply and demand

errors.name: EmergencyPauseRequired
errors.msg: Emergency pause required for this operation

errors.name: InsufficientTimeElapsed
errors.msg: Insufficient time elapsed for this operation

types.name: AppealDecision
docs: Appeal decision options

types.name: AuctionState
docs: Tracks the state of an auction during and after clearing

types.name: BatchResult
docs: Batch processing result for bids

types.name: Bid
docs: A single bid entry

types.name: BidPage
docs: Page of bids (linked list)

types.name: BidRegistry
docs: Registry to track all bid pages for efficient lookup

types.name: BuyerAllocation
docs: Buyer allocation tracking multi-seller energy distribution

types.name: CancellationState
docs: Tracks cancellation refund progress

types.name: DeliveryReport
docs: Delivery report from oracle

types.name: EmergencyState
docs: Emergency pause state

types.name: EmergencyWithdrawalType
docs: Emergency withdrawal types

types.name: FillReceipt
docs: Receipt created for each winning buyer after settlement

types.name: GlobalState
docs: Global protocol config

types.name: GovernanceProposal
docs: Governance proposal for parameter changes

types.name: PriceLevelAggregate
docs: Aggregates bids at the same price level for efficient demand curve construction

types.name: ProposalType
docs: Types of governance proposals

types.name: RefundBatchResult
docs: Refund batch processing result

types.name: SellerRegistry
docs: Registry to track all sellers for a timeslot

types.name: SlashingState
docs: Slashing state for delivery verification

types.name: Supply
docs: Minimal Supply struct for MVP (one-time immutable per timeslot)

types.name: SupplyAllocationResult
docs: Supply allocation result

types.name: SystemHealthReport
docs: System health report

types.name: SystemStatus
docs: System health status

types.name: Timeslot
docs: Auction round container

types.name: Vote
docs: Vote options

types.name: VoteRecord
docs: Individual vote record
